maqras.text: Ej farzandoni Odam, ʙa hangomi har iʙodat liʙosi xud ʙipused. Va niz ʙixuredu ʙijosomed, vale isrof makuned, ki Xudo isrofkoronro dust namedorad

Bigu: «Ci kase liʙoshoero, ki Xudo ʙaroi ʙandagonas ʙarovardaast va xurdanihoi xusta'mro harom kardaast?». Bigu: «In cizho dar in dunjo ʙaroi kasonest, ki imon ovardaand va dar ruki qijomat niz xosi onho ʙosad». Ojoti Xudoro ʙaroi donojon incunin ʙatafsil ʙajon mekunem

Bigu: «Parvardigori man, zistkorihoro ci oskor ʙosand va ci pinhon va niz gunohonu afzuni custan ʙa nohaqro harom kardaast va niz harom ast, cizero sariki Xudo sozed, ki hec dalele ʙar vucudi on nozil nasudaast jo dar ʙorai Xudo cizhoe ʙigued, ki namedoned
Har ummatero muddati umrest. Cun acalason faro rasad, jak soat pesu pas nasavand»
Ej farzandoni Odam, har goh pajomʙarone az xudi sumo ʙijojand va ojoti Maro ʙar sumo ʙixonand, kasone, ki parhezgori kunand va ʙa saloh ojand, ʙime ʙar onho nest va xud ƣamgin namesavand
Va onho, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ ʙarovardaand va az on sar ʙargoftaand, ahli cahankamand va covidona dar on xohand ʙud

Kist sitamkortar az on, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ ʙandad jo ojoti Uro duruƣ ʙarorad? Nasiʙe, ki ʙarojason muqarrar suda, ʙa onho xohad rasid. On goh ki firistodagoni mo ʙijojand, to conasonro ʙigirand, mepursand: «0n cizhoe, ki ʙa coi Xudo parastis mekarded. akiui kucojand?. Gujand; «Nest sudand va az dasti mo raftand!» Va dar in hol ʙa zijoni xud sohidi dihand, ki kofir ʙudaand

Gujad: «Ba mijoni ummathoe, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, az cinnu ins dar otas doxil saved. Har ummate, ki ʙa otas doxil savad, ummati hamdini xudro la'nat kunad. To cun hamagi dar on co gird ojand, guruhhoe, ki pajrav ʙudaand, dar ʙorai guruhhoe, ki pesvo ʙudaand, gujand: «Parvardigoro, inho moro gumroh kardand, ducandon dar otas azoʙason kun». Gujad: «Azoʙi hama ducandon ast, vale sumo namedoned!»
Pesvojon ʙa pajravon gujand: «Sumoro ʙar mo hec ʙartari nest, inak ʙa cazoi korhoe, ki karda ʙuded, azoʙro ʙicased!»

Darhoi osmon ʙar rui kasone, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ guftand va az onho sar toftaand, kusoda namesavand va ʙa ʙihist namedarojand, to on goh, ki sutur az suroxi suzan ʙigzarad. Va osijonro incunin cazo medihem
Bistare az otasi cahannam dar zer va pusise az otasi cahannam ʙar ruj dorand. Va sitamkoronro incunin cazo medihem
Ba hec kas ƣajri andozai tavonas taklif namekunem. Onon, ki imon ovardaand, va korhoi neku kardaand, ahli ʙihistand va dar on co covidonand

Va har guna kinaero az dilason ʙarmekanem. Nahrho dar zeri pojason corist. Gujand: «Sukr Xudoro, ki moro ʙa in roh rahʙari karda va agar moro rahʙari nakarda ʙud, rohi xud namejoftem. Rasuloni Parvardigori mo ʙa haq omadand. Va on goh onhoro ovoz dihand, ki ʙa ivazi korhoe, ki mekarded, in ʙihistro ʙa sumo dodaand!»

Bihistijon duzaxijonro ovoz dihand, ki mo ʙa haqiqat joftem on ciro, ki Parvardigoramon va'da doda ʙud, ojo sumo niz ʙa haqiqat joftaed on ciro, ki Parvardigoraton va'da doda ʙud? Gujand: «Ore». On goh ovozdihandae dar on mijon ovoz dihad, ki la'nati Xudo ʙar kofiron ʙod
Onon, ki az rohi Xudo ruj ʙarmegardonand va onro kacravi mepindorand va ʙa qijomat imon nadorand

Va mijonason hicoʙest va ʙar a'rof mardone hastand, ki hamaro ʙa nisonijason mesinosand va ahli ʙihistro ovoz medihand, ki salom ʙar sumo ʙod. Inho harcand tama'ja ʙihist dorand, vale hanuz ʙa on doxil nasudaand
